verses.roman:
upa-purāṇeha śuni śrī-kṛṣṇa-vacana
kṛpā kari vyāsa prati kariyāchena kathana

synonyms: upa-purāṇeha—in the Upapurāṇas; śuni—we hear; śrī-kṛṣṇa-vacana—the words of Lord Kṛṣṇa; kṛpā kari—having mercy; vyāsa prati—toward Vyāsadeva; kariyāchena—He did; kathana—speaking.
translation: In the Upapurāṇas we hear Śrī Kṛṣṇa showing His mercy to Vyāsadeva by speaking to him as follows.
